content: replace the plastic bags in the fresh produce aisle with this beautiful and simple **wecare mesh fruit net** 1 the wecare fruit net is designed to take up minimal space while at the same time being very roomy and easy to use the net comes in two sizes this is the larger version and can contain up to 10 pieces of loose fruit it s crocheted in rainbow lace a thin mercerised cotton an extra strong yarn that is perfect for this project rainbow lace comes in a multitude of wonderful colors and a single ball is enough to complete two wecare fruit nets have fun making **materials** rainbow lace crochet hook 2 5 mm yarn usage about 20g **abbreviations** magic_ring magic_ring chain chain stitch st s stitch es single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet 1 https //hobbii com/wecare-fruit-net-large utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=wecare-fruit-net-large+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
